mapper.select: SELECT b_Reply.USER_CODE, b_Reply.BOARD_CODE, b_Reply.USER_REPLY, b_Reply.REPLY_DATE, users.NAME FROM b_Reply, users where b_Reply.USER_CODE = users.USER_CODE and b_Reply.BOARD_CODE=#{bIdx} order by USER_REPLY_NO desc
mapper.insert: insert into b_reply(USER_REPLY_NO, USER_CODE, BOARD_CODE, USER_REPLY,REPLY_DATE) values(BOARD_RPY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uIdx}, #{bIdx}, #{uReContent}, sysdate )
